recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, low, high)
    integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: low, high
    integer :: pivot_idx

    if (low < high) then
        pivot_idx = partition(arr, low, high)
        call quicksort(arr, low, pivot_idx - 1)
        call quicksort(arr, pivot_idx + 1, high)
    end if
end subroutine quicksort

function partition(arr, low, high) result(pivot_idx)
    integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: low, high
    integer(kind=8) :: pivot
    integer :: i, j

    pivot = arr(high)
    i = low - 1

    do j = low, high - 1
        if (arr(j) <= pivot) then
            i = i + 1
            call swap(arr(i), arr(j))

    integer(kind=8) :: temp

module quicksort_module
contains
    recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, low, high)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer :: pivot_idx

        if (low < high) then
            pivot_idx = partition(arr, low, high)
            call quicksort(arr, low, pivot_idx - 1)
            call quicksort(arr, pivot_idx + 1, high)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort

    function partition(arr, low, high) result(pivot_idx)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer(kind=8) :: pivot
        integer :: i, j

        pivot = arr(high)
        i = low - 1

        do j = low, high - 1
            if (arr(j) <= pivot) then
                i = i + 1
                call swap(arr(i), arr(j))
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
end if
        end do

        call swap(arr(i+1), arr(high)) pivot_idx = i + 1
    end function partition

    subroutine swap(a, b)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: a, b
        integer(kind=8) :: temp

        temp = a
        a = b
        b = temp
    end subroutine swap
end module quicksort_module

module quicksort_module
contains
    recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, low, high)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer :: pivot_idx

        if (low < high) then
            pivot_idx = partition(arr, low, high)
            call quicksort(arr, low, pivot_idx - 1)
            call quicksort(arr, pivot_idx + 1, high)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort

    function partition(arr, low, high) result(pivot_idx)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer(kind=8) :: pivot
        integer :: i, j

        pivot = arr(high)
        i = low - 1

        do j = low, high - 1
            if (arr(j) <= pivot) then
                i = i + 1
                call swap(arr(i), arr(j))

module quicksort_module
contains
    recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, low, high)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer :: pivot_idx

        if (low < high) then
            pivot_idx = partition(arr, low, high)
            call quicksort(arr, low, pivot_idx - 1)
            call quicksort(arr, pivot_idx + 1, high)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort

    function partition(arr, low, high) result(pivot_idx)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer(kind=8) :: pivot
        integer :: i, j

        pivot = arr(high)
        i = low - 1

        do j = low, high - 1
            if (arr(j) <= pivot) then
                i = i + 1
                call swap(arr(i), arr(j))
            end if
        end do

        call swap(arr(i+1), arr(high))
        pivot_idx = i + 1
    end function partition

    subroutine swap(a, b)
        integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: a, b
        integer(kind=8) :: temp

        temp = a
        a = b
        b = temp
    end subroutine swap
end module quicksort_module
